20110111181320.000|20110111181322.000|CC1|        FOR TUBERCULOSIS.

20110111181325.000|20110111181325.000|CC1|    ALWAYS TELL YOUR DOCTOR IF  
20110111181325.000|20110111181327.000|CC1| YOU HAVE ANY SIGN OF INFECTION,

20110111181328.000|20110111181328.000|CC1|        ALERT YOUR DOCTOR       
20110111181328.000|20110111181331.000|CC1|   OF NEW OR WORSENING PROBLEMS 
20110111181331.000|20110111181331.000|CC1|  INCLUDING HEADACHES, SEIZURES,
